annonstext:
Are you the ambitious student with an analytical master-mind we’ve been looking for?!

Become a part of transforming Europe’s leading Ferry Company
At Stena Line, we believe everything is connected. By bringing people and goods together, we enable businesses and societies to grow. As a company, we are on an exciting journey driven by technology and new digital habits, developing our business to create outcomes that matter to our customers.

Our Procurement team consists of seven colleagues and a manager, handling all procurement for the Stena Line Group. We work together to create value for the company in close collaboration with key stakeholders in the different regions. To strengthen our department during the summer holidays, we are now looking for two Operational Buyers.

What will you do?
As Operational Buyer your role is to safeguard that procurement activities are performed according to Stena Line purchasing process, policy and other guiding documents. One of the two Buyers we´re looking for will be working with our procurement system, Palette Byer, and the other one will be working with our procurement system, AMOS.

Some of your key responsibilities:
- As Key user be the “go to” person for support
- Support the organisation with placing orders
- System updates
- Perform price comparisons
- Negotiate terms & conditions
- System administration

Who are you?
At Stena Line your personality matters as much as how good you are at what you do. We are looking for someone with a lot of drive, ambition and with a “yes, we can” mindset. You are ready to take the next step and start your career within Procurement. Your enthusiasm and self-motivation makes you a great team player, who enjoys working with other people. You are flexible, enjoy a fast pace environment and being part of a change transformation. Your analytical and problem-solving skills will also come in handy in this role.

The must-haves:
- Ongoing university studies in Maritime-, Logistics- or Procurement Management
- Good communication skills in English and Swedish, both written and oral
- Good computer skills

Interested?
This is a full-time temporary position, between June and August, based in Gothenburg within our Procurement department. To apply, please register your profile and send in your application in English as soon as possible but no later than 4th of April, 2021. Please note that due to GDPR we do not accept applications via e-mail or postal service. We have collective bargaining agreements with Unionen, among others, who you can contact for more information.  

If you have any questions regarding the position you are welcome to contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Head of Group Procurement at  EMAIL  or about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Talent Acquisition Partner,  EMAIL .

Please note that we kindly decline any offers from recruitment or staffing agencies regarding this recruitment.

About Stena FIRSTNAME
LASTNAME the leader of sustainable shipping, Stena Line has Europe’s most comprehensive route network focusing on transportation of both passengers and freight. We have over 4300 employees in our Stena Line family across Scandinavia, around the UK and the Baltics, making a contribution to our company. We believe it is up to us where we want to go next and how far we want to go. The journey starts with us.

Working at Stena Line means having a safe and stable workplace and a great work-life balance. We are committed to maintaining and developing a sustainable working environment, free from harassment, that gives equal opportunities to everyone. We embrace equality, diversity and inclusion – and welcome all applicants.
